ntnu.stud.valens.demonstration.connectivity

Class ContentProviderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ntnu.stud.valens.demonstration.connectivity.ContentProviderHelper

  • public class ContentProviderHelper
extends Object
    Retrives data from the contentprovider, interprets them, and passes them on in a form useful to the gui
    Author:
    Johannes, Dat-Danny

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ContentProviderHelper(Context context) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Double> cpGetSpeedHistory(int length)
      returns a list containing information for the statistics class to display Information is gotten from the content provider and it is sorted with x value and y value interleaved with each other, starting with x

      returns a list containing information for the statistics class to display Information is gotten from the content provider and it is sorted with x value and y value interleaved with each other, starting with x

      • cpGetStepsHistory

        public List<Double> cpGetStepsHistory(int length,
                             int interval)
        returns a list containing information for the statistics class to display Information is gotten from the content provider and it is sorted with x value and y value interleaved with each other, starting with x
        Parameters:
        length - is the time in number of intervals backwards
        interval - is the size for each interval, in number of hours
        Returns:
